column4: I am booting off a USB HDD and when after the GRUB menu but before GDM All I get is a blank screen then the boot splash for a second then GDM. Pressing del or F1 or anything to see details doesn't work. Anyway to fix this?
Tik: make a new wireless connection and make sure to click "connect automatically"
Tik: I am doing it
Anyone have any ideas why I can't see boot up? Maybe some moudule I need to add?
what do you want to see?
ANYTHING during boot up
the splash screen or the detailed text
I select kernel then blank untill right before
GDM
put "verbose" for text and "quiet, splash" for the picture
quiet splash is alreeady there
I tried verbose and same result
where did you put it?
that's why I think it's a module
after everything
in grub during boot?
quiet splash was already there so I replaced ot with verbose
it*
thats weird, in that case I dont know whats wrong, sorry
is there any USB module that may not be loaded during boot?
if you boot from usb I'd think all usb-stuf is loaded, but I know very little about that
anyway to check?
I think you should ask again here, and mention you are booting from usb
